meanings.sent1: My cat seemed chummier after I gave her some treats.
meanings.sent2: The chummier atmosphere at the party made everyone feel welcome.
meanings.sent3: The chummier puppy wagged its tail happily.
meanings.sent4: The chummier tone of the conversation warmed my heart.
meanings.sent5: The chummier smile on her face brightened the room.

meanings.definition: A person who is friendly or familiar.
meanings.sent1: My neighbor is the chummier who always waves hello.
meanings.sent2: The chummier greeted us with a warm hug.
meanings.sent3: The chummier at the store always tells funny jokes.
meanings.sent4: She is the chummier who brings cookies to share.
meanings.sent5: The chummier in our group organizes fun events for us.
